title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 

Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 121 of 2020) is amended 
by the substitution of “the 5th day of May 2020” for “the 12th day of April 
2020”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

10 April, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th April, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [128] 3

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A-Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 121 of 2020) to provide 
that the Regulations shall remain in operation until 5 May 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [128]
